comment.author: Bradley
comment.text: The voting system was different at the time Reagan was elected. Now, voting machines can and ARE hacked. That's what I'm concerned about.

replies.author: Nathan
replies.text: Die bold machines, owned by DICK Cheney

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: And so are we. Makes me sick to think about it

replies.author: Logan
replies.text: Already voted for you. Cut tav
